name: Glass Ceiling
description:
Glass Ceiling is a competitive game for two players.

Controls

Orange Player: WASD

Pink Player: Arrow Keys

If keyboard commands aren't working, try clicking inside the game window to ensure that it has focus for keyboard input and it should begin responding

The game also supports 1-2 controllers (Dpad to move, any button to jump)

How to play

  • The player with the most points when the timer elapses is the winner
  • Orange earns points by collecting money
  • Pink earns points by collecting money, nudging the glass upward, and for staying out of the water
  • Pink loses points while in the water
  • Every time Orange collects money, the water level rises
